text.私なんかにも長所があるって…\r\nトレーナーさんの言葉で、\r\nすごく救われ:
My trainer told me that I have my own 
strengths… She saved me a lot…
text.トレーナーさんといる時の私…\r\nちょっとだけ自信があって…\r\nちょっとだ:
When I'm with my trainer… I'm a little 
more confident… a little bit more… maybe 
I like it a little bit better.
text.ドジばっかの私なのに、いっぱい\r\n向き合ってくれて、信じてくれて\r\n…あ:
Thank you so much for your support and 
trust in me even though I'm a screw-up.
text.羽根つきって難しいですよね…。\r\n私、振り遅れてばっかりで\r\nすぐ顔が墨:
It's so difficult to play with feathers, 
isn't it… I'm always late in swinging, 
and my face is always covered in ink.
text.チョコを作ったんですが…\r\n試食してくれたシャカールさんが\r\n倒れちゃっ:
I made some chocolate… but Ms. 
Shakur, who tasted it, collapsed… 
what should I do～!
text.あ、あの…チョコ、いりませんか？\r\n私…料理はダメダメですけど、\r\n1個:
Um… do you want some chocolate? 
I'm a terrible cook, but I 
managed to make one…!
text.短冊に願いを書いてきました～。\r\n…名前書き忘れちゃいましたけど\r\nきっ:
I wrote my wish on a tanzaku strip. I 
forgot to write my name, but I'm sure it 
will come true… right?
text.えっ？ハロウィンって今日！？\r\nあのあのぉ…トレーナーさんは\r\nいたずら:
What? Halloween is today? Um, um… 
trainers don't do pranks, right?
text.サンタさんにも私みたいな\r\nあわてんぼうがいるらしくって…\r\n…ちょっと:
I heard that Santa Claus has 
some dilettantes like me and 
I'd like to meet them.
text.トレーナーさんへのプレゼント…\r\n忘れず持ってこられました！\r\nあとで受:
A gift for the trainer… I didn't forget 
to bring it! Can you accept it later…?
text.大掃除って、やればやるほど\r\n散らかっちゃうんですよね…。\r\nシャカール:
The more I try to clean up, 
the more messy it gets… I rely 
on Ms. Shakur a lot…
text.お誕生日おめでとうございます～。\r\n穏やかな1日を過ごせるように、\r\n私:
Happy Birthday～! I'll be hiding 
in the corner to make sure you 
have a peaceful day…
text.お誕生日なのに…私なんかと\r\nいてくれてありがとうございます。\r\nせ、精:
Thank you for staying with me even 
though it's your birthday. I'll do my 
best to celebrate…!
text.誕生日は、こんな私でも主役に\r\nなれる日です…。おめでとうを\r\nたくさん:
Birthdays are a day when even I can be 
the star of the show… It's a happy day 
when I get lots of congratulations.
text.わ、私にプレゼントですか？うぅ…\r\n誕生日を覚えていてくれたことが\r\nも:
Wow, a present for me? Ugh… the fact 
that you remembered my birthday is 
already the best present ever～!
text.新しいお知らせがありますね～。\r\n…よく見忘れちゃうので\r\nちゃんとチェ:
There is a new announcement… …I 
often forget to look at it, so 
I have to check it properly…
text.贈り物が届いてました～。\r\n私みたいに、宛名を書き忘れた方は\r\nいないみ:
I received a gift! It seems no one 
forgot to address it like I did…!
text.ミッション達成、おめでとう\r\nございます～。やっぱり\r\nトレーナーさんは:
Congratulations on accomplishing 
your mission! Your trainer is 
amazing after all…!
text.も、もうすぐイベントですね…。\r\n誰にも迷惑かけずに\r\n過ごせるといいん:
I hope I can spend the time without 
bothering anyone～… I hope I can spend it 
without bothering anyone～…
text.イベント開催中みたいです～。\r\nちょっと覗くくらいなら、\r\n私も邪魔にな:
It looks like an event is being 
held. If I just take a peek, I 
hope I won't get in the way…?
text.ふらふらで目が…あれぇ？\r\nトレーナーさんが3人、5人…\r\nどんどん増え:
I'm woozy and my eyes… what the heck? 
Three trainers, five trainers… more and 
more trainers…
text.うぅぅ…ちょっとだけ休憩を…。\r\n体力もダメダメなウマ娘で\r\nすみませぇ:
Ugh… just a short break… I'm a horsegirl 
with no physical strength… Sorry～…!
text.今の私はひと味違います～。\r\nオペラオーさんのモノマネ、\r\n噛まずにでき:
I am different now! I was able to 
imitate Opera O without biting…!
text.今なら、なんでもできそう…\r\nはっ！言いすぎました…！:
I can do anything now… 
Ha! I was out of line…!
text.今日は調子がいい気がして…\r\n色々試してみたいんですが…\r\nダ、ダメでし:
I feel like I'm doing better 
today… I'd like to try some 
things… Da, is it no good…?
text.調子がいい時は貴重なので…\r\n今のうちにできるだけ\r\nトレーニングしたい:
When I'm in good shape, it's precious… 
I want to train as much as I can 
while I still can…
text.その…もう少し端に寄りませんか？\r\n私なんかが広い場所で\r\nトレーニング:
Can we move a little closer 
to the edge? I'm afraid to train 
in such a large space.
text.できることから始めれば、\r\n私でも成長…できるでしょうか？:
If I start with what I can do, will I be 
able to grow?
text.他のみなさんがいつもより\r\n眩しくて…本当に\r\n追いつけるんでしょうか…:
I'm so dazzled by the rest of you, more 
so than usual… can we really catch up…?
text.私、足を引っ張ってないですか…？\r\nご迷惑かけてばかりで…くすん。:
Am I not pulling your leg…? I'm just 
causing you trouble… smh.
text.ドジばかりでごめんなさい…。\r\n生まれてきてごめんなさいぃぃ…。:
I'm sorry for all my screw-ups… I'm 
sorry I was born…
text.あぅぅぅぅ…私はやっぱり\r\nダメでグズで救いようもない\r\nウマ娘なんです:
Aaahhh… I'm still a no-good, goofy, 
irredeemable, u-ma-girl…
text.はふぅ…あのぉ、レース出ますか？\r\n…で、出ますよね。ダメな子は\r\nいっ:
Huff… uh, are you going to the race? So, 
you are going to enter the race, right? 
A bad boy has to work hard…
text.ごめんなさい、ごめんなさい…！\r\n走らなきゃ…レース、出なきゃ…\r\nなの:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry…! I have to run… I 
have to race… but I can't move…
text.は、はーっはっはっはっは！\r\n………きょ、今日の気合いは\r\nオペラオーさ:
Ha-ha-ha-ha!……… your spirit today is on 
par with that of Ms. Opera O!
text.準備、ちゃんとできたから…\r\nいつも以上の力を出せる…\r\n気がします…！:
Now that I've prepared properly, I feel 
like I can exert more energy than usual.
text.気のせいかもしれませんが\r\nちょっとだけ調子がいいかもです。\r\n…ちょっ:
Maybe it's just my imagination, but I 
think I'm feeling a little better. …Just 
a little bit.
text.私にしては、まともにやって\r\nこられたかもしれません～…。:
For me, I think I might 
have done decently -……
text.この調子なら…\r\nちゃんと気をつければ\r\n悪い結果にはならないかも…？:
At this rate… if I'm careful, it might 
not end badly…?
text.は、はひぃ！レースですね…！\r\n失敗しないように気をつけます～！:
Ha, hahi! It's a race…! I'll be careful 
not to fail～!
text.ふ、普通にがんばれるかと～。\r\n…ゲートに服、\r\n引っかけたりしなければ:
I thought I could do my best normally. 
…as long as I don't get my clothes 
caught in the gate…
text.すぅ～はぁ～…。\r\n冷静に…冷静にっ…！: Soooo～ hah～… Stay calm… stay calm…!
text.こんな調子じゃ…\r\nいえ、なんでもないです…っ！\r\nやるだけやらなきゃ…:
At this rate… No, it's nothing…! I just 
have to do it…
text.このコンディション…\r\nちょっとだけ、不安かも…。:
This condition… I might 
be a little bit worried…
text.す、すみません…。\r\nなんだか調子が出なくて～…。\r\nあっ、けど全力は尽:
I'm sorry… I'm not feeling well～… Oh, 
but I'll do my best…!
text.調子ですかぁ～？バッチリ…\r\nダメダメですぅ～…。でもでも、\r\nなんとか:
How are you doing? Perfectly fine… I'm 
not good at all～… But I'll try somehow…!
text.酷い状態ですけど、\r\n奇跡が起こるかもしれないので…\r\nめげずに走ります:
I'm in a terrible state, but miracles 
may happen… I'll keep on running…!
text.絶不調でも…諦めずに走れば、\r\n救いはあるかもしれませんよね…？:
Even if you're in a slump… if you don't 
give up and keep running, there might be 
a way to save your life… right?
text.ふえぇん…お世話に…なりましたぁ～。: Fwen… thank you… for your help!
text.わ、私、\r\n迷惑かけてなかったでしょうか…？: I hope I didn't cause you any trouble…?
text.あ、あとひとつ…\r\nいえ、なんでもっ…！: Oh, one more thing… No, nothing…!
text.な、なんとか入着だけは～…。: Well, I managed to get in……………………
text.せ、精一杯歌いますっ！: I will sing as much as I can!
text.トレーナーさんがくれた言葉…\r\nこれからも私のお守りとして\r\n大事にして:
The trainer's words… I will keep them as 
my good luck charm from now on.
text.おはようございます～。…あの、\r\n私、寝癖ついていませんか…？\r\nボサボ:
Good morning. I'm sorry, do I have a 
sleeping habit…? It's not shaggy…?
text.オペラオーさんとウララさん、\r\nいつも朝からお元気ですよね～。\r\n私も見:
Opera O and Urara, you are always so 
energetic in the morning! I should learn 
from them too…!
text.お昼は食べましたか～？\r\n私は…パンを鳥に取られたので\r\n後で買い直しま:
Have you eaten lunch? I… had 
to buy some more bread later 
because a bird took it away…
text.昼食の後はいつも眠くて～…。\r\n前みたいに隣のクラスに\r\n入らないように:
I'm always sleepy after lunch… 
I have to make sure I don't join 
the next class like before…
text.夜って落ち着きますね…。こう…\r\n落ち込んだり、じめじめしたり\r\nしても:
I feel at ease at night… I feel as if 
people will forgive me if I get 
depressed or depressed.
text.今日も1日、お疲れ様でした～。\r\n明日こそ、ご迷惑をかけないように\r\nが:
Thank you for your hard work today! 
Tomorrow, I will do my best not to cause 
you any trouble…!
text.夏は…暑くて苦手ですけど、\r\n向日葵とかキラキラの日差しとか…\r\nそうい:
I don't like summer… because it's too 
hot, but I like sunflowers and sparkling 
sunlight… I think I like those things…
text.授業で『貴方の秋はなに？』って\r\n課題が出たんですが…私なんかに\r\nふさ:
In a class assignment, we were 
asked, "What's your favorite autumn 
season?" but is there an appropriate 
autumn for me?
text.冬の寒さは、結構平気なんです。\r\n小さい頃は北にいましたし、\r\nほかほか:
I'm not afraid of the cold in winter. 
I used to live in the north when 
I was a child, and I have gloves 
and other gloves.
text.落ち込んでる時って、\r\nなにかに隠れたくなりませんか？\r\n建物の陰とか、:
When you are depressed, don't you feel 
like hiding behind something? Behind a 
building, behind someone…
text.私の両親、すごく優しいんです。\r\n『ドトウはすごい子だ』って…\r\nぜんぜ:
My parents are very kind. They said, 
"Dotou is a great kid"…even though 
that's not true at all…
text.わた…ボクこそが世紀末覇王さ！\r\nはーっはっはっは！！\r\n………に、似て:
I am the King of the End of the Century! 
Ha-ha-ha-ha! Did I look like ………?
text.私もオペラオーさんと\r\nアヤベさんみたいな関係に…\r\nいえっ、恐れ多いで:
I also have a relationship like that 
between Ms. Operao and Ms. Ayabe… No, 
I'm too afraid…!
text.あわわ…タイキシャトルさんから\r\nパーティーに誘われたんですけど\r\n私、:
Aww… Ms. Taikishattle invited me to a 
party, but I think I'm out of place…?
text.ボタンが多い服はちょっと…。\r\nその、ドジなせいで\r\nよく掛け違えてしま:
I don't like to wear clothes with many 
buttons. Because of my clumsy nature, I 
often misplace buttons…
text.テンポが速い曲を歌うのって、\r\n緊張しませんか…？\r\n…か、噛んじゃいそ:
Aren't you nervous when you sing a 
fast-paced song? I'm afraid I'll chew…
text.このカバンがあれば、\r\n勇気100倍です～。強さも…\r\nそのくらいあると:
With this bag, I would be 100 
times braver～. And strength… 
I hope it has that much.
text.カバンと胸のリボン、\r\nかわいくてお気に入りなんです～。\r\nつけていると:
I love the bag and the ribbon on my 
chest, they are so cute! I feel like I 
will be cheered up when I wear it.
text.うぅ、カバンが重いと思ってたら…\r\n教科書じゃなくて\r\n目覚まし時計が入:
Ugh, I thought my bag was heavy… 
but it wasn't my textbooks, 
it was my alarm clock!
text.購買のにんじんパン…ちょっと\r\n気になりますけど、早いもの\r\n勝ちだと私:
The carrot bread at the store… I'm 
a little curious about it, but I'm 
not sure I can make it if the first 
one to buy it wins…
text.夜道は危険がいっぱいですね…。\r\nぶつかったり転んだり、\r\n寮に帰るだけ:
The streets at night are full of 
danger… I was so exhausted just 
going back to my dormitory…
text.桜は危険です～…。見とれて\r\n歩いていたら、柱にぶつかって\r\nたんこぶが:
Cherry blossoms are dangerous… When I 
was walking around admiring the cherry 
blossoms, I hit a pillar and got a bump…
text.海は危険ですぅ…。カニさんを\r\n怒らせて指を挟まれたり、\r\n浮き輪が流さ:
The sea is dangerous… You may get your 
finger caught in a crab's mouth, or your 
float may be swept away……
text.や、焼き芋は危険れす～！\r\nよーく冷まさないと、私みたいに\r\n舌をヤケド:
Yaki-imo is dangerous! If you don't let 
it cool down well, you'll burn your 
tongue like I did… hah…
text.雪は…綺麗ですけど危険ですぅ。\r\nツルっと滑って坂道を転がって…\r\nよく:
Snow is… beautiful but dangerous. I 
often slip and fall down hills… and 
become a snowman…
text.どのトレーニングにしますか…？\r\n決められないので…\r\n選んで頂けるとう:
Which training would you like…? 
I can't decide… I would be happy 
if you could choose one.
text.お、遅れてすみませぇぇん…！\r\nなんとか準備終わりましたぁ…！:
Sorry for the delay…! We've managed to 
finish preparations…!
text.練習中、変なドジしないように\r\n気をつけるので…その、\r\nご指導お願いで:
I'll try not to make any silly mistakes 
during practice, so… well, could you 
please guide me…?
text.が、合宿ですし、\r\nその…ビシバシ鍛えて\r\nいただければと…っ！:
But it's a training camp, and I hope you 
will train me hard…!
text.ちょっとずつでも…\r\n前へ進めば変われますよね…？:
Even a little bit at a time… if we move 
forward, we can change… right?
text.私を見捨てないでいてくれた\r\nトレーナーさんのために…\r\nもっともっと成:
For the sake of my trainer who never 
gave up on me… I will grow even more!
text.トレーニングでも、前とは違う\r\n私をお見せできるかと～…！\r\nきっと、多:
I thought I could show you a different 
me in training…! Maybe, just maybe… 
a little bit!
text.トレーナーさんのおかげで…\r\n胸を張って生きていけますぅぅ～！:
Thanks to my trainer… I can 
live with my chest out～!
text.こんな私にも…\r\n救いはあったんですね～…！: Even for me… there was salvation～…!
text.ちょ、ちょっとは成長できたかと…っ！: I thought I had grown up a bit…!
text.ド、ドドドドドトウです！\r\n夢は――えっ、時間切れ…！？:
It's do-do-do-do-do-do-do! The dream is 
- eh, time is running out…!
text.仲良し…って感じ？: Are you guys close… kind of?
text.ハ、ハイスコアですかぁ～！？: Ha, is that a high score!
text.よぉ～しっ！あれ？はわっ！ひぃ～っ！んあっ！？\r\nはぁ～…。あっ………よぉ～:
Yo～! Huh? Huh! Hee～! Nn～? 
Huh～… Ah……… Yo～shi～!
text.あのぉ～…今日は\r\nどんなトレーニングを？:
Um… what kind of training 
did you do today?
text.楽しいお話、\r\nいっぱいあるみたいです～。:
It seems like there are lots of fun 
stories to tell!
text.レ、レースに\r\nエントリーしますか…？: Les, do you want to enter the race…?
text.えっと…ウマ娘名鑑のレベルが\r\n上がったみたいです～。:
Well… it seems that the level of the 
horsegirl directory has been raised.
text.足を引っ張らないようにしますぅ～…！: I'll try not to drag my feet…!
text.お、お力になれるかわかりませんが…。: Oh, I don't know if I can help you…
text.私でもお役に立てれば…！: If I can be of any help…!
text.なんだか…\r\n心がポカポカしますぅ～！: It kind of… makes my heart flutter～!
text.今でも夢みたいです～。私なんかが\r\nトレセン学園の制服を着てるなんて…。:
It's still a dream come true! I can't 
believe I'm wearing the uniform of 
Tracen Academy…
text.このリボン、5本目なんです…。\r\nよく引っかけたり、破いたりしちゃって…。:
This is my 5th ribbon… I 
often snag or tear them…
text.ふわふわの衣装を着てると、\r\n気持ちもふわふわしますね～。:
Wearing a fluffy costume 
makes me feel fluffy too!
text.うぅぅ…ライブで転んで、\r\n衣装汚さないようにしないと…！:
Ugh… I'd better not fall down at the 
concert and get my costume dirty…!
text.ど、どうでしょう…？\r\n勝負服に着られちゃってませんか…？:
What do you think…? Have you been 
dressed in your best clothes?
text.カバンには絆創膏や包帯が。\r\nこれでいつドジしてもバッチリです～。:
In my bag are plasters and bandages. Now 
you are ready even if you mess up!
text.か、勝ってみせます……私だって……！: I'm going to win.…… I'm going to win……!
text.おはようございますぅ！\r\nさあ、ご案内いたしま…あれ？\r\n今日はお化け屋:
Good morning! Let me show you around… 
Isn't today the day of the Haunted House?
text.ス、ストッキングに穴が…！はぅ…\r\nシャカールさんに教えていただいて\r\n:
My stockings have holes…! I changed 
my stockings after Ms. Shakur 
taught me how to do it.
text.お化け屋敷って、暗くて怖くて…。\r\n…あっ、お昼くらい明るかったら、\r\n:
Haunted houses are dark and scary… …Oh, 
if it was light at noon, would you be 
able to enjoy it even if you are scared?
text.ぐすっ…すみません。みなさんの\r\nために作ったパンプキンパイ…\r\n炭しか:
I'm sorry. The pumpkin pie I 
made for you all…………………………………left 
nothing but charcoal～～.
text.く、暗いので、足もとには\r\nお気をつけくださいぃ…！私は、\r\n灯りがあっ:
It is very dark, so please be careful 
where you step. I fall down even if 
there are lights…
text.ひゃっ！？トレーナーさん！？\r\nじゃあ、さっき話しかけたのに無視\r\nされ:
Hyah! Trainer! Then the reason you 
ignored me when I tried to talk to you 
earlier… You've got the wrong person!
text.は、春の風は怖いんですよねぇ。\r\n帽子が飛ばされて追いかけたら、\r\n遭難:
The spring wind is scary, isn't it? My 
hat was blown off and I chased after it, 
only to get lost… I'm so sick of it!
text.収穫した巨大カボチャ、落として\r\n真っ二つにしちゃいまして…。\r\n一生を:
I dropped the huge pumpkin I harvested 
and cut it in half… I'll spend the rest 
of my life trying to save it～!
text.い、いたずらってなにをすれば\r\nいいんでしょう…！うぅ…\r\nプレッシャー:
What am I supposed to do as a prank…! 
Ugh… I'm dizzy from the pressure…!
text.寒い日に帽子を外に置くと、\r\nタヌキさんが潜りにくるんですぅ。\r\n気づい:
When I leave my hat outside on a cold 
day, a raccoon dog comes to hide in it. 
When I noticed her, she was breathing in 
her sleep… heh heh.
text.キャンディは食べられずに、ずっと\r\n眺めてしまって…見てると宝石商の\r\n:
I couldn't eat the candy, but I kept 
looking at it… and I could see my 
father's face in the jewelry store.
text.デジタルさん、1日に何度も倒れて\r\n起きて…きっとお疲れなんですね。\r\n:
Ms. Digital, you must be exhausted, 
falling down and getting up several 
times a day. Would it be a nuisance if I 
offered you something?
text.ウインディさんは私を噛まない\r\nそうですぅ。泣きすぎてツマンナイ\r\nのだ:
Windy won't bite me. She says I'm 
crying too much and it's not good 
for me… I'm a little sad.
text.ふ、ふえぇ～～い…！ふぃ～～！\r\nでで、できてます？ヘリオスさんに\r\n教:
Wheeeeee…! Whee～! So, is it done? Helios 
taught me how to do this Parisian thing…!
text.パーマーさん、私なんかの演歌も\r\n盛り上げてくれて…えへへ。\r\nカラオケ:
Palmer-san, you made my enka 
songs so much fun… ehehe… Karaoke… 
I hope we can go again…
text.カボチャを被ると、違う自分に\r\nなれた気がするんです。\r\n少しだけ強くて:
When I wear a pumpkin, I feel like a 
different person. A little stronger, a 
little bigger…
text.外に出ると、どうしてカラスさんに\r\n狙われるんでしょう…ふえっ！？\r\nカ:
Why do crows always try to get me when I 
go outside? So many pumpkin crumbs!
text.朝の占い、カボチャがラッキー\r\nアイテムだったんです…えへへ。\r\nい、い:
My morning horoscope showed that pumpkin 
was my lucky item… hehehe…! Maybe 
something good will happen…!
text.お、おやつタイムは、ウララさんと\r\nお菓子を持ち寄って集まるんです。\r\n:
We bring snacks and sweets to the 
snack time with Ullala. I wonder 
what I should bring today…
text.最近、夜になると猫さんが\r\n遊びに来てくれるんですぅ。\r\nこの服が気にな:
Recently, a cat comes to visit me at 
night. I wonder if they are interested 
in these clothes?
text.うぅ…私は悪い先輩ですぅ！迷子の\r\n新入生にそーっと声をかけたら、\r\n泣:
Ugh… I'm a bad senior! I gently 
called out to a lost freshman 
and startled her to tears～!
text.…み、水…水ありませんか？\r\nカボチャを被ったまま\r\nウトウトしたら、汗:
Do you have any water? I fell 
asleep with a pumpkin on my 
head and I'm sweating…!
text.わ、私…絶対にマズイですよぉ。\r\nなのに、みなさん私を見て、\r\n『お腹減:
I… I definitely shouldn't be doing 
this. And yet you all look at me 
and say, "I'm starving…"!
text.よ、よかったらこちらへ…。\r\nランタンが温かいんですよ。\r\nどうですか…:
Yo, come this way if you like… 
The lantern is warm. How is 
it… is it helpful?
text.どんなメニューでもこなしますぅ！\r\nと、トレーナーさんが示す道は\r\n正し:
I will do whatever it takes! 
And I know that the trainer's 
path is the right one…!
text.わ、悪いことが起きないように\r\n衣装の力で追い返しみゃ…っ！？\r\nふえ～:
Wow, let's use the power of the costume 
to turn them away so that nothing bad 
will happen to them…? I'm so excited…!
text.うぐっ…。へ、平気ですぅ。\r\n首のリボンが緩まないように、\r\nちょっとキ:
Ugh… I'm fine. I just made the ribbon 
around her neck a little tighter so it 
wouldn't come loose… ugh.
text.ふふっ、今日の私はひと味違い\r\nます。ヒールが歩きやすくて、\r\nまだ1回:
I'm different today. My heels are 
comfortable to walk on, and I've only 
fallen once…!
text.なりたい自分になるのって、\r\n難しいですね…。\r\nでも、諦めたくないです:
It's difficult to become the person I 
want to be… But I don't want to give up…!
text.行きたいところが\r\nあったら言ってください…！\r\nがが、がんばって案内し:
Please let me know if there is 
anywhere you want to go…! I'll 
do my best to show you around!
text.と、トレーナーさんは私の救いで…\r\n私にとっての道しるべで――\r\n心から:
My trainer is my salvation… my guide… 
and I trust her with all my heart!
text.導いてくれた未来…。\r\nこれからも一緒に進みたいですぅ！:
A future that has guided us… I hope we 
continue to move forward together!!!
text.迷わずゴールできましたぁ～。:
I was able to reach the 
goal without hesitation!
text.ふわっ…心に火が灯ったみたいですぅ。:
Wow… it's like a fire 
was lit in my heart.
text.わ、私なんかを\r\n導いてくれるんですね…！: You're guiding me all the way?
text.メイショウドトウですぅ。\r\nいつか辿り着けると信じて…！:
Meishoudou de suu. I believe we'll get 
there someday…!
text.ランタンの灯りを眺めるとホッとしますぅ。:
I feel relieved when I look at the 
lantern lights.
text.袖にしまったお菓子、みんな落ちてる！？:
Candy tucked into sleeves, 
they're all falling out!
text.私は魂の導き手…って、\r\nここどこですかぁ～！？: I am the guide of souls… where am I?
text.はぁい、こちらですぅ…ふえーっ！？こここ、\r\n来ないで～～！あっ…なんだぁ♪:
Yes, this way please… Here, here, don't 
come～! Oh… what?
text.一緒に勝利の宴へ～…！\r\n…ご案内しましゅっ！:
Let's go to the victory banquet 
together…! Let me show you around!
text.あ、新しい年には私が…\r\nみ、みなさんに幸せを\r\nお届けしたいんですぅ…:
I want to bring happiness to you all in 
the new year…!
text.ど…どうしましょう…。\r\n私のドジのせいで、またみなさんに\r\nご迷惑かけ:
What should I do? Because of my 
screw-up, I'm causing trouble for 
everyone again…
text.はうぅ～、き、緊張しますぅ～！\r\nでも…、今日までできることは、\r\nやっ:
I'm so nervous! But… I've done 
everything I could until today!
text.イベント、お疲れ様でした～！\r\nわ、私、ちゃんとみなさんに幸せを\r\nお届:
Thank you for your hard work at the 
event! I hope I was able to bring 
happiness to everyone…!
text.聖蹄祭の準備をデジタルさんとも\r\nできるなんて…なんだか\r\nとっても、う:
I am very, very happy to be able to work 
with Ms. Digital in preparation for the 
Sacred Hoof Festival…!
text.しょ、勝負です…！\r\n………ひえぇ、\r\n言っちゃったぁぁぁ…。: It's a game…! ………Hey, I said it…
text.あうぅ…ま、まだいけます…。\r\n私、まだがんばれます…！:
Ahhh… I can still do it…! 
I can still do my best…!
text.お、お疲れ様です: Oh, thank you for your help.
